input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOWN OF GENNEVILLIERS. Summary: Construction of the School Group of the Zac Des Chanterainesrelaunch Macro-Lot B, Lots 8, 12 and 16. Description: Considering the phasing of the overall development project, it was decided to build this school group in two stages in order to meet the evolving and growing needs of the neighborhood:<br> - initially, it will be a question of building a school group of 20 classes corresponding to the reception capacities housing in phases 1 and 2 of the ZAC.<br> - secondly, by 2035-2040, the school group must be able to expand according to needs updated school forecasting. To date, we estimate a potential expansion of 9 classes maximum.<br> This procedure concerns uniquely the first phase but the precautionary measures necessary for the realization of the future extension are integrated into the technical hypotheses of phase 1 (structural load reduction, network sizing, electrical power, etc.).<br> Are affected by this procedure only macro-lot B, lots 8, 12 and 16 following their declaration without action for legal and technical reasons.<br> In application of article L.2113-10 of the Public Procurement Code, this consultation is broken down into 4 macro-lots and seven lots, each macro-lot or lot being the subject of a separate market, entrusted to a company or a group of companies and defined as follows:<br> - Macro-batch A composed of the following batches:<br> - Lot 01 VRD;<br> - Lot 02 Landscape;<br> - Lot 03 Structural work - Earthworks<br> - Macro-lot B composed of the following lots:<br> - Lot 04a/04b Metal and Wood Frame / .... Published Date: 2025-10-22. Closing Date: 2025-11-03. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Construction of the School Group of the Zac Des Chanterainesrelaunch Macro-Lot B, Lots 8, 12 and 16

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: RTE RÉSEAU DE TRANSPORT D'ELECTRICITÉ. Summary: Marine Survey by Unmanned or Autonomous Vehicles. Description: RTE, the French electricity transmission system operator, is responsible for developing, building and operating high-voltage submarine links for interconnection with neighbouring countries, or for connecting offshore wind farms to the terrestrial transmission grid. RTE currently operates a wide range of submarine cables on the Manche Channel, Atlantic and Mediterranean facades. In the future, the number of cables shall further increase with the development of HVDC long distance links to offshore wind farms. These cables can be floating or laid on the sea floor. In this context, RTE carries out regular submarine data collection campaigns during the design, construction, and operational maintenance phases of its assets. These campaigns may include bathymetric surveys, geophysical soundings, UXO findings, optical monitoring of structures or environmental monitoring and measurements. Currently carried out by conventional means (surface vessels or on foot at landfall), these investigations could in the future be carried out by autonomous or remotely-controlled robots/vehicles. In addition to reducing costs, the expected benefits include operational efficiency, reduced risk for personnel, and a smaller environmental footprint for operations, as well as the accuracy of the data collected. RTE would like to investigate on innovative autonomous or remote solutions applicable to its scope of service for cables, particularly AUVs (Autonomous Underwater Vehicles), USVs (Unmanned Surface.... Published Date: 2025-09-16. Closing Date: 2025-10-31. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Concession Contract having for Object the Financing, the Realization, the Development and the Exploitation of a Heat Network Fueled by Renewable Energy in the Territory of the Municipality .... Description: Concession contract having for object the financing, the realization, the development and the exploitation of a heat network fueled by renewable energy in the territory of the municipality ...<br> The municipality of Collonges is competent on its territory to create, develop, maintain and Manage urban heat networks.<br> As part of its policy in terms of ecological transition, and in order to continue its commitments in the field of its skills on the scale of its territory, the municipality of Collonges (01550) seeks to enhance all renewable energy sources And to limit as much as possible the use of fossil fuels for heating.<br> The network will be powered by a new boiler room with an ENR rate more than 80%.<br> The project should make it possible to limit the impact of future increases Predictable of the price of energies by mainly using a fuel which is not dependent on variations in the price of the barrel of oil and the Euros/dollars parity. It could also allow the development of a regional sector promoting job creation.<br> The wood-energy network should allow invoicing according to the VAT at reduced rate 5.5% on the fixed share (power subscribed by the subscriber) and on the variable share (amount of energy consumed by the subscriber and covering the purchase of the energies necessary for heat production). input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: HAUTES-ALPES DEPARTMENT. Summary: Electricity Supply and Associated Services for a Set of Delivery Points from the Hautes-Alpes Department. Description: This consultation is carried out within the framework of a group of orders between the Hautes-Alpes department and certain colleges of the department set out in the RC, in accordance with articles L. 2113-6 to L. 2113-8 of the public procurement code. The Hautes-Alpes department is appointed coordinator of the order group. The estimated amounts correspond to the maximum amounts excluding the renewal period included. For lot n 1, the maximum amount excluding tax is 2,350,000 euros per period. For lot n 2, the maximum amount excluding tax is 300,000 euros per period. The amounts will be identical For each renewal period. The framework agreement will be executed by the conclusion of subsequent markets. Each batch will be the subject of a separate attribution. The services are paid by unit prices. This consultation concerns the supply, electricity delivery and services Associates. Its purpose is the conclusion, on behalf of the members of the order group, a framework agreement for: - supply and delivery of electricity for delivery points (PDL) supplied in low and high tension. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SPL ARAC OCCITANIE. Summary: Competitive Dialogue for the Design, Manufacture and Supply of Photovoltaic Tiles for the Mobility Hall (Operation N 50320). Description: The future multimodal hall Marengo, located between the SNCF station and the metro station will play a key role in mobility in the heart of the city of Toulouse and will be called upon to become a major and structuring public equipment. Its architecture, with high environmental ambition, is distinguished in particular By remarkable coverage not only by its form but also by its production of solar electricity. These characteristics make this cover a major issue for the success of the project, from an architectural, constructive and technical point of view. This consultation concerns exclusively The exterior, productive and visible layer of this cover. This represents a total surface of around 2800m2, composed, significantly in equal parts, of solar tiles and passive tiles which, together, reproduce the colorimetry of the covers of the city of Toulouse. Its characteristics geometrics and colorimetrics being specific; Existing products on the French market cannot be implemented as is on this coverage. In addition, the client does not envisage any modification or adaptation of the building. In this context, the competitive dialogue will have to develop, manufacture and provide the company that will be responsible for the installation, the photovoltaic coverage system that will meet all of the architectural, functional and technical criteria applicable to this project. It will be interconnected with the 3 tram lines in the city, the buses, bus and the airport. The market 5 portrays mostly On the manufacture and installation of the Passerelle and the bioclimatic and photovoltaic canopy.<br> Manufacturing and implementation of the Poultons access gateway to the quays and the bioclimatic canopy at the wedding airport station.<br> The work to be carried out consist in the realization of the access gateway At the quays and the bioclimatic canopy which covers the passenger building, the bridge, the plan of tracks and platforms of the Nice Airport station and associated technical lots (structural work - Art Ouvrage - VRD/ Landscape - CVC/ PLB - SOE) and are to be carried out within the framework of this single market everything State body.<br> Doc Title: LNPCA_NAE - Market 5 Passerelle and Canopee<br> Type contract: Works. Published Date: 2025-07-21. Closing Date: 2025-08-22. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SIDELEC. Summary: Installation of Photovoltaic Power Plants in Self -Consumption in 3 Municipalities in Reunion. Description: The purpose of this market is to install photovoltaic power plants in self-consumption in 3 municipalities in Reunion: Trois-Bassins commune: central kitchen, Avirons commune: sports complex, Entre-deux commune: swimming pool. This market is allocated in 3 lots. These lots are then divided into 2 slices. Each batch breaks down into a firm edge and an optional slice. The closed tranche relates to the installation of photovoltaic power plants in self -consumption in 3 municipalities in Reunion. The optional slice relates to the operation and maintenance of these installations.. Published Date: 2025-06-25. Closing Date: 2025-07-28. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: BESANCON TOWN HALL. Summary: Agreement Frame for the Supply and Routing of Electricity and its Associated Services for the Sites of the City of Besancon, the Grand Besancon Metropole and the Members of January 1 2 2. Description: Supply and routing of electricity and its associated services for sites all segments and all powers combined for members of the Electricity Order Group, City of Besancon & Grand Besancon Metropole, coordinated by the City of Besancon. Products and services ordered are delivered to the various sites with electricity pdl. The consultation is launched via a group of orders enabled by the Convention constituting a permanent order group of 09/14/2023. The city of Besancon is coordinator of this group. In this context, It is responsible for the organization of operations prior to the census of needs to the members, the assembly of the framework agreement, the selection of its holders, the notification of the framework agreement and then of the designation of the award of the subsequent market of each of the lots and its notification. Each member will take over as soon as the market is notified to the awarded, to then ensure the proper execution of the market. Framework agreement with a maximum of three holders per lot. He went into application of articles L. 2125-1 1 , R. 2162-1 to R. 2162-12 of the code public procurement. It will give rise to the conclusion of subsequent markets. Framework agreement without minimum, and with a total maximum of services for the duration of the framework agreement of 60 million euros for lot 1 and 3.2 million euros (s) for the Lot 2. Published Date: 2025-06-25. Closing Date: 2025-07-31. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The provider will have to carry out diagnoses of the quality of the gas installations offered by GRDF:<br> -pan who move in with accommodation for residential use in which the interior installation of gas has been out of service for more than six months (GRDF diagnostics).<br> -pan Flocked for more than 12 years in accommodation for residential use and whose gas boiler has more than 12 years (sedentary diagnostics)<br> (Set called gas quality diagnostics).<br> These gas quality diagnoses are initiated by the distributor.<br> Gas quality diagnostics obey following fundamental principles:<br> • The service is centered on a technical act (control of the customer's interior installation) which takes place in an environment of related procedures (administrative, IT, communication to the customer, ...);<br> • Installation control Interior of a customer, carried out in the context of a diagnosis, aims to ensure by a visual examination and measures to concentrate carbon monoxide, that this installation does not have any defect capable of putting the client or a third party in danger. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TARN DEPARTMENTAL ENERGY SYNDICATE (SDET). Summary: Direct Purchasing Contract of Renewable Origin. Description: The purpose of this consultation is to conclude a supplies of supplies relating to direct purchase from a producer ("producer"), by the members concerned, of electricity produced from one or more production assets of renewable origin ("Power Purchase Agreement" or"PPA"), in accordance with article L. 331-5, 3 of the energy code. The PPA which will be concluded at the end of this procedure will be associated with the delivery market and supply of electricity passed by the group (subsequent market relating to the framework agreement relating to delivery, the supplyelectricity and natural gas and the aggregation of electricity production of renewable origin). As such, the producer must: - transfer within the supplier's equilibrium responsibility perimeter (or successive suppliers) designated by the coordinator, the production resulting fromthe installation (or installations) of production, from January 1, 2027; - Contract with suppliers who will be appointed to him by the coordinator following the procedures for allocating subsequent markets mentioned to the pointprevious..
